column4: o I'm building a new web server and I'm trying to decide on which web server to go with.  Right now I'm torn between ngnix, apache, & lighttp.  Anyone have any experience/suggestions/etc on which is the best.  Especially in a low memory environment?   The server is running Ubuntu 8.04 also.
I've run lighttpd, I can recommend it.. relatively easy to use, fast, and minimal footprint. I ran it with php as a cgi on a VPS with 64mb of RAM
Okay thanks.  I have always ran apache before so I am use to it.  Have used lighttp once but never long enough to get a real feel for it.   Thanks for the info
